title: _TRIGGER_VEHICLE_WEAPON_RELOAD
content:
0x5B1513F27F279A44// TriggerVehicleWeaponReload
BOOL _TRIGGER_VEHICLE_WEAPON_RELOAD(Vehicle vehicle, int seat, Ped ped);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle containing the weapon to reload.seat: The seat/weapon index.ped: The ped initiating the reload (the one using the weapon).Returns: Return true if reload was triggered successfully, false otherwise.Start a reload for a vehicle's weapon.NativeDB Introduced: v3407
codeBlocks:
// TriggerVehicleWeaponReload
BOOL _TRIGGER_VEHICLE_WEAPON_RELOAD(Vehicle vehicle, int seat, Ped ped);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for _TRIGGER_VEHICLE_WEAPON_RELOAD
_TriggerVehicleWeaponReload(vehicle, 0, ped)
